Reviews.Title: “comfortable stay, close to victoria station”
Reviews.Author: joseph A
Reviews.Content: hotel pretty stayed studio modern basic bathroom clean todate mirror shower okish wished water pressure abit stronger hot water wasnt glitch lights fuse blew wasnt fixed instant heating wished allowed heat couldnt set power level

Reviews.Title: “Small price, small room, Great location”
Reviews.Author: AnaliaK
Reviews.Content: looking location london 5 minutes victoria bus railways station tubesubway cheap breakfast option lcd tv bathrooms plastic ones mind quick shower breakfast gone enjoy london

HotelInfo.Name: Ebury House
HotelInfo.Address: 102 Ebury St, London SW1W 9QD, England
